cnd8:2.3: aditthajotana puccha, ditthasamsandana puccha, vimaticchedana puccha.
cnd8:2.5: Pakatiya lakkhanam annatam hoti adittham atulitam atiritam avibhutam avibhavitam.
cnd8:2.6: Tassa nanaya dassanaya tulanaya tiranaya vibhutatthaya vibhavanatthaya panham pucchati—
cnd8:3.2: Pakatiya lakkhanam natam hoti dittham tulitam tiritam vibhutam vibhavitam.
cnd8:3.3: Annehi panditehi saddhim samsandanatthaya panham pucchati—
cnd8:4.3: “evam nu kho, na nu kho, kim nu kho, katham nu kho”ti?
cnd8:5.4: Manussa buddham bhagavantam upasankamitva panham pucchanti, bhikkhu pucchanti, bhikkhuniyo pucchanti, upasaka pucchanti, upasikayo pucchanti, rajano pucchanti khattiya pucchanti, brahmana pucchanti, vessa pucchanti, sudda pucchanti, gahattha pucchanti, pabbajita pucchanti—
cnd8:6.2: Amanussa buddham bhagavantam upasankamitva panham pucchanti, naga pucchanti, supanna pucchanti, yakkha pucchanti, asura pucchanti, gandhabba pucchanti, maharajano pucchanti, inda pucchanti, brahma pucchanti, deva pucchanti—
cnd8:7.2: Bhagava rupam abhinimminati manomayam sabbangapaccangam ahinindriyam.
cnd8:7.3: So nimmito buddham bhagavantam upasankamitva panham pucchati.
cnd8:8.4: ditthadhammikatthapuccha, samparayikatthapuccha, paramatthapuccha … aparapi tisso puccha—
cnd8:8.5: anavajjatthapuccha, nikkilesatthapuccha, vodanatthapuccha … aparapi tisso puccha—
cnd8:8.6: atitapuccha, anagatapuccha, paccuppannapuccha … aparapi tisso puccha—
cnd8:8.7: ajjhattapuccha, bahiddhapuccha, ajjhattabahiddhapuccha … aparapi tisso puccha—
cnd8:8.8: kusalapuccha, akusalapuccha, abyakatapuccha … aparapi tisso puccha—
cnd8:8.9: khandhapuccha, dhatupuccha ayatanapuccha … aparapi tisso puccha—
cnd8:8.10: satipatthanapuccha, sammappadhanapuccha, iddhipadapuccha … aparapi tisso puccha—
cnd8:8.11: indriyapuccha, balapuccha, bojjhangapuccha … aparapi tisso puccha—
cnd8:9.1: Pucchami tanti pucchami tam yacami tam ajjhesami tam pasademi tam “kathayassu me”ti pucchami tam.
cnd8:9.4: Bruhi metanti bruhi acikkhahi desehi pannapehi patthapehi vivarahi vibhajahi uttanikarohi pakasehiti—
cnd8:11.2: Vedaguti tam mannami, bhavitattoti tam mannami, evam janami, evam ajanami evam patijanami evam pativijjhami.
cnd8:11.4: Vedo vuccati catusu maggesu nanam panna pannindriyam pannabalam …pe…
cnd8:11.6: Bhagava tehi vedehi jatijaramaranassa antagato antappatto kotigato kotippatto pariyantagato pariyantappatto vosanagato vosanappatto tanagato tanappatto lenagato lenappatto saranagato saranappatto abhayagato abhayappatto accutagato accutappatto amatagato amatappatto nibbanagato nibbanappatto.
cnd8:11.10: sakkayaditthi vidita hoti, vicikiccha vidita hoti, silabbataparamaso vidito hoti, rago doso moho mano vidito hoti, viditassa honti papaka akusala dhamma sankilesika ponobhavika sadara dukkhavipaka ayatim jatijaramaraniya.
cnd8:14.2: Bhagava bhavitakayo bhavitasilo bhavitacitto bhavitapanno bhavitasatipatthano bhavitasammappadhano bhavitaiddhipado bhavitaindriyo bhavitabalo bhavitabojjhango bhavitamaggo, pahinakileso patividdhakuppo sacchikatanirodho.
cnd8:14.3: Dukkham tassa parinnatam, samudayo pahino, maggo bhavito, nirodho sacchikato, abhinneyyam abhinnatam, parinneyyam parinnatam, pahatabbam pahinam, bhavetabbam bhavitam, sacchikatabbam sacchikatam, aparitto mahanto gambhiro appameyyo duppariyogalho bahuratano sagarupamo chalangupekkhaya samannagato hoti.
cnd8:15.1: Cakkhuna rupam disva neva sumano hoti na dummano;
cnd8:15.3: Sotena saddam sutva, ghanena gandham ghayitva, jivhaya rasam sayitva, kayena photthabbam phusitva, manasa dhammam vinnaya neva sumano hoti na dummano;
cnd8:16.1: Cakkhuna rupam disva manapam rupam nabhigijjhati nabhihamsati na ragam janeti.
cnd8:16.2: Tassa thitova kayo hoti, thitam cittam ajjhattam susanthitam suvimuttam.
cnd8:16.3: Cakkhuna kho paneva rupam disva amanapam na manku hoti appatitthitacitto alinamanaso abyapannacetaso.
cnd8:16.4: Tassa thitova kayo hoti thitam cittam ajjhattam susanthitam suvimuttam.
cnd8:16.6: ghanena gandham ghayitva … jivhaya rasam sayitva … kayena photthabbam phusitva … manasa dhammam vinnaya manapam nabhigijjhati nabhihamsati na ragam janeti.
cnd8:16.7: Tassa thitova kayo hoti thitam cittam ajjhattam susanthitam suvimuttam.
cnd8:16.8: Manasayeva kho pana dhammam vinnaya amanapam na manku hoti.
cnd8:16.9: Appatitthitacitto alinamanaso abyapannacetaso tassa thitova kayo hoti thitam cittam ajjhattam susanthitam suvimuttam.
cnd8:17.1: Cakkhuna rupam disva manapamanapesu rupesu thitova kayo hoti thitam cittam ajjhattam susanthitam suvimuttam.
cnd8:17.3: manasa dhammam vinnaya manapamanapesu dhammesu thitova kayo hoti thitam cittam ajjhattam susanthitam suvimuttam.
cnd8:18.1: Cakkhuna rupam disva rajaniye na rajjati, dussaniye na dussati, mohaniye na muyhati, kopaniye na kuppati, madaniye na majjati, kilesaniye na kilissati.
cnd8:18.3: manasa dhammam vinnaya rajaniye na rajjati, dussaniye na dussati, mohaniye na muyhati, kopaniye na kuppati, madaniye na majjati, kilesaniye na kilissati.
cnd8:19.1: Ditthe ditthamatto, sute sutamatto, mute mutamatto, vinnate vinnatamatto.
cnd8:19.2: Ditthe na limpati, sute na limpati, mute na limpati, vinnate na limpati.
cnd8:19.3: Ditthe anupayo anapayo anissito appatibaddho vippamutto visannutto vimariyadikatena cetasa viharati.
cnd8:19.5: mute … vinnate anupayo anapayo anissito appatibaddho vippamutto visannutto vimariyadikatena cetasa viharati.
cnd8:20.1: Samvijjati bhagavato cakkhu, passati bhagava cakkhuna rupam, chandarago bhagavato natthi, suvimuttacitto bhagava.
cnd8:20.2: Samvijjati bhagavato sotam, sunati bhagava sotena saddam, chandarago bhagavato natthi, suvimuttacitto bhagava.
cnd8:20.3: Samvijjati bhagavato ghanam, ghayati bhagava ghanena gandham, chandarago bhagavato natthi, suvimuttacitto bhagava.
cnd8:20.4: Samvijjati bhagavato jivha, sayati bhagava jivhaya rasam, chandarago bhagavato natthi, suvimuttacitto bhagava.
cnd8:20.5: Samvijjati bhagavato kayo, phusati bhagava kayena photthabbam, chandarago bhagavato natthi, suvimuttacitto bhagava.
cnd8:20.6: Samvijjati bhagavato mano, vijanati bhagava manasa dhammam, chandarago bhagavato natthi, suvimuttacitto bhagava.
cnd8:21.1: Cakkhu ruparamam ruparatam rupasammuditam, tam bhagavato dantam guttam rakkhitam samvutam;
cnd8:21.4: ghanam gandharamam gandharatam … jivha rasarama rasarata rasasammudita, sa bhagavato danta gutta rakkhita samvuta;
cnd8:21.6: Kayo photthabbaramo photthabbarato photthabbasammudito … mano dhammaramo dhammarato dhammasammudito, so bhagavato danto gutto rakkhito samvuto;
cnd8:27.1: Evam bhagava bhavitattoti mannami tam vedagum bhavitattam.
cnd8:28.3: “evam nu kho, na nu kho, kim nu kho, katham nu kho”ti—
cnd8:28.5: Dukkhati jatidukkham, jaradukkham, byadhidukkham, maranadukkham, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasadukkham, nerayikam dukkham, tiracchanayonikam dukkham, pettivisayikam dukkham, manusikam dukkham, gabbhokkantimulakam dukkham, gabbhatthitimulakam dukkham, gabbhavutthanamulakam dukkham, jatassupanibandhakam dukkham, jatassa paradheyyakam dukkham, attupakkamam dukkham, parupakkamam dukkham, dukkhadukkham, sankharadukkham, viparinamadukkham, cakkhurogo sotarogo ghanarogo jivharogo kayarogo sisarogo kannarogo mukharogo dantarogo kaso saso pinaso daho jaro kucchirogo muccha pakkhandika sula visucika kuttham gando kilaso soso apamaro daddu kandu kacchu rakhasa vitacchika lohitapittam madhumeho amsa pilaka bhagandala pittasamutthana abadha semhasamutthana abadha vatasamutthana abadha sannipatika abadha utuparinamaja abadha visamapariharaja abadha opakkamika abadha kammavipakaja abadha sitam unham jighaccha pipasa uccaro passavo damsamakasavatatapasarisapasamphassam dukkham, matumaranam dukkham, pitumaranam dukkham, bhatumaranam dukkham, bhaginimaranam dukkham, puttamaranam dukkham, dhitumaranam dukkham, natibyasanam dukkham, rogabyasanam dukkham, bhogabyasanam dukkham, silabyasanam dukkham, ditthibyasanam dukkham;
cnd8:28.6: yesam dhammanam adito samudagamanam pannayati, atthangamato nirodho pannayati, kammasannissito vipako, vipakasannissitam kammam, namasannissitam rupam, rupasannissitam namam, jatiya anugatam, jaraya anusatam, byadhina abhibhutam, maranena abbhahatam, dukkhe patitthitam, atanam alenam asaranam asaranibhutam—
cnd8:28.8: Ime dukkha kuto samudagata kuto jata kuto sanjata kuto nibbatta kuto abhinibbatta kuto patubhuta kimnidana kimsamudaya kimjatika kimpabhavati, imesam dukkhanam mulam pucchati hetum pucchati nidanam pucchati sambhavam pucchati pabhavam pucchati samutthanam pucchati aharam pucchati arammanam pucchati paccayam pucchati samudayam pucchati papucchati yacati ajjhesati pasadetiti—
cnd8:29.2: Ye keciti sabbena sabbam sabbatha sabbam asesam nissesam pariyadiyanavacanametam—
cnd8:29.4: Lokasminti apayaloke manussaloke devaloke khandhaloke dhatuloke ayatanaloke.
cnd8:32.3: Pabhavam apucchasiti dukkhassa mulam pucchasi hetum pucchasi nidanam pucchasi sambhavam pucchasi pabhavam pucchasi samutthanam pucchasi aharam pucchasi arammanam pucchasi paccayam pucchasi samudayam pucchasi yacasi ajjhesasi pasadesiti—
cnd8:33.2: Tanti dukkhassa mulam pavakkhami hetum pavakkhami nidanam pavakkhami sambhavam pavakkhami pabhavam pavakkhami samutthanam pavakkhami aharam pavakkhami arammanam pavakkhami paccayam pavakkhami samudayam pavakkhami acikkhissami desessami pannapessami patthapessami vivarissami vibhajissami uttanikarissami pakasessamiti—
cnd8:33.4: Yatha pajananti yatha pajananto ajananto vijananto pativijananto pativijjhanto.
cnd8:33.5: Na itihitiham na itikiraya na paramparaya na pitakasampadaya na takkahetu na nayahetu na akaraparivitakkena na ditthinijjhanakkhantiya samam sayamabhinnatam attapaccakkhadhammam tam kathayissamiti—
cnd8:34.3: tanhupadhi, ditthupadhi, kilesupadhi, kammupadhi, duccaritupadhi, aharupadhi, patighupadhi, catasso upadinnadhatuyo upadhi, cha ajjhattikani ayatanani upadhi, cha vinnanakaya upadhi, sabbampi dukkham dukkhamanatthena upadhi.
cnd8:34.5: Dukkhati jatidukkham jaradukkham byadhidukkham maranadukkham sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasadukkham nerayikam dukkham …pe…
cnd8:34.7: Yesam dhammanam adito samudagamanam pannayati, atthangamato nirodho pannayati, kammasannissito vipako, vipakasannissitam kammam, namasannissitam rupam, rupasannissitam namam, jatiya anugatam, jaraya anusatam, byadhina abhibhutam, maranena abbhahatam, dukkhe patitthitam, atanam alenam asaranam asaranibhutam—
cnd8:34.9: Ime dukkha upadhinidana upadhihetuka upadhipaccaya upadhikarana honti pabhavanti sambhavanti jayanti sanjayanti nibbattanti patubhavantiti—
cnd8:35.2: Ye keciti sabbena sabbam sabbatha sabbam asesam nissesam pariyadiyanavacanametam—
cnd8:35.4: Lokasminti apayaloke manussaloke devaloke khandhaloke dhatuloke ayatanaloke.
cnd8:38.2: Yoti yo yadiso yathayutto yathavihito yathapakaro yamthanappatto yamdhammasamannagato khattiyo va brahmano va vesso va suddo va gahattho va pabbajito va devo va manusso va.
cnd8:38.4: Upadhim karotiti tanhupadhim karoti, ditthupadhim karoti, kilesupadhim karoti, kammupadhim karoti, duccaritupadhim karoti, aharupadhim karoti, patighupadhim karoti, catasso upadinnadhatuyo upadhi karoti, cha ajjhattikani ayatanani upadhi karoti, cha vinnanakaye upadhi karoti janeti sanjaneti nibbatteti abhinibbattetiti—
cnd8:39.1: Punappunam dukkhamupeti mandoti punappunam jatidukkham jaradukkham byadhidukkham maranadukkham sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasadukkham eti samupeti upagacchati ganhati paramasati abhinivisatiti—
cnd8:39.3: Mandoti mando momuho avidva avijjagato annani avibhavi duppannoti—
cnd8:40.2: Tasmati tankarana tamhetu tappaccaya tamnidana etam adinavam sampassamano upadhisuti tasma.
cnd8:40.3: Pajananti pajananto ajananto vijananto pativijananto pativijjhanto, “sabbe sankhara anicca”ti pajananto ajananto vijananto pativijananto pativijjhanto,
cnd8:40.6: “yam kinci samudayadhammam sabbam tam nirodhadhamman”ti pajananto ajananto vijananto pativijananto pativijjhanto.
cnd8:40.7: Upadhim na kayirati tanhupadhim na kareyya, ditthupadhim na kareyya, kilesupadhim na kareyya, duccaritupadhim na kareyya, aharupadhim na kareyya, patighupadhim na kareyya, catasso upadinnadhatuyo upadhi na kareyya, cha ajjhattikani ayatanani upadhi na kareyya, cha vinnanakaye upadhi na kareyya, na janeyya na sanjaneyya na nibbatteyya nabhinibbatteyyati—
cnd8:41.2: Pabhavanupassiti dukkhassa mulanupassi hetanupassi nidananupassi sambhavanupassi pabhavanupassi samutthananupassi aharanupassi arammananupassi paccayanupassi samudayanupassi.
cnd8:41.4: Ya panna pajanana …pe… amoho dhammavicayo sammaditthi.
cnd8:41.5: Imaya anupassanaya pannaya upeto hoti samupeto upagato samupagato upapanno samupapanno samannagato.
cnd8:44.1: Yam tam apucchimha akittayi noti yam tam apucchimha ayacimha ajjhesimha pasadayimha.
cnd8:44.2: Akittayi noti kittitam pakittitam acikkhitam desitam pannapitam patthapitam vivaritam vibhattam uttanikatam pakasitanti—
cnd8:45.1: Annam tam pucchama tadingha bruhiti annam tam pucchama, annam tam yacama, annam tam ajjhesama, annam tam pasadema, uttari tam pucchama.
cnd8:45.2: Tadingha bruhiti ingha bruhi acikkhahi desehi pannapehi patthapehi vivarahi vibhajahi uttanikarohi pakasehiti—
cnd8:46.1: Katham nu dhira vitaranti ogham, jatim jaram sokapariddavancati.
cnd8:46.3: “evam nu kho, nanu kho, kim nu kho, katham nu kho”ti—
cnd8:46.5: Dhirati dhira pandita pannavanto buddhimanto nanino vibhavino medhavino.
cnd8:46.7: Jatiti ya tesam tesam sattanam tamhi tamhi sattanikaye jati sanjati okkanti nibbatti abhinibbatti khandhanam patubhavo ayatananam patilabho.
cnd8:46.8: Jarati ya tesam tesam sattanam tamhi tamhi sattanikaye jara jiranata khandiccam paliccam valittacata ayuno samhani indriyanam paripako.
cnd8:46.9: Sokoti natibyasanena va phutthassa bhogabyasanena va phutthassa rogabyasanena va phutthassa silabyasanena va phutthassa ditthibyasanena va phutthassa annatarannatarena byasanena va samannagatassa annatarannatarena dukkhadhammena va phutthassa soko socana socitattam antosoko antoparisoko antodaho antoparidaho cetaso parijjhayana domanassam sokasallam.
cnd8:46.10: Paridevoti natibyasanena va phutthassa bhogabyasanena va phutthassa rogabyasanena va phutthassa silabyasanena va phutthassa ditthibyasanena va phutthassa annatarannatarena byasanena va samannagatassa annatarannatarena dukkhadhammena va phutthassa adevo paridevo adevana paridevana adevitattam paridevitattam vaca palapo vippalapo lalappo lalappana lalappitattam.
cnd8:47.1: Katham nu dhira vitaranti ogham, jatim jaram sokapariddavancati dhira katham oghanca jatinca jaranca sokanca paridevanca taranti uttaranti pataranti samatikkamanti vitivattantiti—
cnd8:47.2: katham nu dhira vitaranti ogham, jatim jaram sokapariddavanca.
cnd8:48.2: Tanti yam pucchami yam yacami yam ajjhesami yam pasademi.
cnd8:48.4: Ya panna pajanana …pe… amoho dhammavicayo sammaditthi.
cnd8:48.5: Bhagava tena nanena samannagato muni monappatto.
cnd8:54.3: agaramunino, anagaramunino, sekhamunino, asekhamunino, paccekamunino munimuninoti.
cnd8:58.1: Sadhu viyakarohiti tam sadhu acikkhahi desehi pannapehi patthapehi vivarahi vibhajahi uttanikarohi pakasehiti—
cnd8:58.3: Tatha hi te vidito esa dhammoti tatha hi te vidito tulito tirito vibhuto vibhavito esa dhammoti—
cnd8:58.4: tatha hi te vidito esa dhammo.
cnd8:59.6: Tatha hi te vidito esa dhammo”ti.
cnd8:61.2: Dhammanti adikalyanam majjhekalyanam pariyosanakalyanam sattham sabyanjanam kevalaparipunnam parisuddham brahmacariyam, cattaro satipatthane, cattaro sammappadhane, cattaro iddhipade, pancindriyani, panca balani, satta bojjhange, ariyam atthangikam maggam, nibbananca, nibbanagamininca patipadam kittayissami acikkhissami desessami pannapessami patthapessami vivarissami vibhajissami uttanikarissami pakasissamiti—
cnd8:62.2: Ditthe dhammeti ditthe dhamme nate dhamme tulite dhamme tirite dhamme vibhute dhamme vibhavite dhamme sabbe sankhara aniccati …pe…
cnd8:62.3: yam kinci samudayadhammam sabbam tam nirodhadhammanti ditthe dhamme nate dhamme tulite dhamme tirite dhamme vibhute dhamme vibhavite dhammeti—
cnd8:62.5: Atha va dukkhe ditthe dukkham kathayissami, samudaye ditthe samudayam kathayissami, magge ditthe maggam kathayissami, nirodhe ditthe nirodham kathayissamiti—
cnd8:62.7: Atha va ditthe dhamme sanditthikam akalikam ehipassikam opaneyyikam paccattam veditabbam vinnuhiti—
cnd8:62.8: evampi ditthe dhamme kathayissamiti ditthe dhamme.
cnd8:62.9: Anitihanti na itihitiham na itikiraya na paramparaya na pitakasampadaya na takkahetu na nayahetu na akaraparivitakkena na ditthinijjhanakkhantiya, samam sayamabhinnatam attapaccakkhadhammam, tam kathayissamiti—
cnd8:63.1: Yam viditva sato caranti yam viditam katva tulayitva tirayitva vibhavayitva vibhutam katva, “sabbe sankhara anicca”ti viditam katva tulayitva tirayitva vibhavayitva vibhutam katva,
cnd8:63.3: “yam kinci samudayadhammam sabbam tam nirodhadhamman”ti viditam katva tulayitva tirayitva vibhavayitva vibhutam katva.
cnd8:63.7: Caranti caranto viharanto iriyanto vattento palento yapento yapentoti—
cnd8:64.2: Yo rago sarago …pe… abhijjha lobho akusalamulam.
cnd8:64.14: visala va pana sa tanha rupe sadde gandhe rase photthabbe dhamme kule gane avase labhe yase pasamsaya sukhe civare pindapate senasane gilanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhare kamadhatuya rupadhatuya arupadhatuya kamabhave rupabhave arupabhave sannabhave asannabhave nevasannanasannabhave ekavokarabhave catuvokarabhave pancavokarabhave atite anagate paccuppanne ditthasutamutavinnatabbesu dhammesu visata vitthatati visattika.
cnd8:64.15: Loketi apayaloke manussaloke devaloke khandhaloke dhatuloke ayatanaloke.
cnd8:64.16: Tare loke visattikanti loke vesa visattika, loke vetam visattikam sato tareyya uttareyya patareyya samatikkameyya vitivatteyyati—
cnd8:67.2: Tanti tuyham vacanam byappatham desanam anusasanam anusittham.
cnd8:67.3: Nandami abhinandami modami anumodami icchami sadiyami yacami patthayami pihayami abhijappamiti—
cnd8:68.3: mahantam silakkhandham esi gavesi pariyesiti mahesi,
cnd8:68.7: mahantam vimuttinanadassanakkhandham esi gavesi pariyesiti mahesi,
cnd8:68.8: mahato tamokayassa padalanam esi gavesi pariyesiti mahesi,
cnd8:68.9: mahato vipallasassa pabhedanam esi gavesi pariyesiti mahesi,
cnd8:68.10: mahato tanhasallassa abbahanam esi gavesi pariyesiti mahesi,
cnd8:68.11: mahato ditthisanghatassa vinivethanam esi gavesi pariyesiti mahesi,
cnd8:68.12: mahato manadhajassa papatanam esi gavesi pariyesiti mahesi,
cnd8:68.13: mahato abhisankharassa vupasamam esi gavesi pariyesiti mahesi,
cnd8:68.14: mahato oghassa nittharanam esi gavesi pariyesiti mahesi,
cnd8:68.15: mahato bharassa nikkhepanam esi gavesi pariyesiti mahesi,
cnd8:68.16: mahato samsaravattassa upacchedam esi gavesi pariyesiti mahesi,
cnd8:68.17: mahato santapassa nibbapanam esi gavesi pariyesiti mahesi,
cnd8:68.18: mahato parilahassa patippassaddhim esi gavesi pariyesiti mahesi,
cnd8:68.19: mahato dhammadhajassa ussapanam esi gavesi pariyesiti mahesi,
cnd8:68.27: mahantam paramattham amatam nibbanam esi gavesi pariyesiti mahesi,
cnd8:68.34: Yo so sabbasankharasamatho sabbupadhipatinissaggo tanhakkhayo virago nirodho nibbanam.
cnd8:68.35: Uttamanti aggam settham visettham pamokkham uttamam pavaram dhammanti—
cnd8:69.1: Yam viditva sato caranti viditam katva tulayitva tirayitva vibhavayitva vibhutam katva, “sabbe sankhara anicca”ti viditam katva tulayitva tirayitva vibhavayitva vibhutam katva,
cnd8:69.4: “yam kinci samudayadhammam sabbam tam nirodhadhamman”ti viditam katva tulayitva tirayitva vibhavayitva vibhutam katva.
cnd8:69.9: dhammesu … dhammanupassanasatipatthanam bhavento sato … so vuccati sato.
cnd8:69.10: Caranti caranto viharanto iriyanto vattento palento yapento yapentoti—
cnd8:70.2: Yo rago sarago …pe… abhijjha lobho akusalamulam.
cnd8:70.5: Tare loke visattikanti loke vesa visattika, loke vetam visattikam sato tareyya uttareyya patareyya samatikkameyya vitivatteyyati—
cnd8:73.1: Yam kinci sampajanasiti yam kinci pajanasi ajanasi vijanasi pativijanasi pativijjhasiti—
cnd8:75.1: Etesu nandinca nivesananca, panujja vinnanam bhave na tittheti etesuti acikkhitesu desitesu pannapitesu patthapitesu vivaritesu vibhajitesu uttanikatesu pakasitesu.
cnd8:75.3: Yo rago sarago …pe… abhijjha lobho akusalamulam.
cnd8:76.1: Panujja vinnananti punnabhisankharasahagatam vinnanam, apunnabhisankharasahagatam vinnanam, anenjabhisankharasahagatam vinnanam.
cnd8:76.2: Etesu nandinca nivesananca abhisankharasahagatanca vinnanam nujja panujja nuda panuda jaha pajaha vinodehi byantikarohi anabhavam gamehiti—
cnd8:77.8: Patisandhika rupam vedana sanna sankhara vinnanam—
cnd8:77.10: Bhave na tittheti nandinca nivesananca abhisankharasahagatam vinnananca kammabhavanca patisandhikanca punabbhavam pajahanto vinodento byantikaronto anabhavam gamento kammabhave na tittheyya patisandhike punabbhave na tittheyya na santittheyyati—
cnd8:80.2: Evamvihariti nandinca nivesananca abhisankharasahagatavinnananca kammabhavanca patisandhikanca punabbhavam pajahanto vinodento byantikaronto anabhavam gamentoti—
cnd8:80.7: Appamattoti sakkaccakari sataccakari atthitakari anolinavuttiko anikkhittacchando anikkhittadhuro appamatto kusalesu dhammesu—
cnd8:80.8: “kathaham aparipuram va silakkhandham paripureyyam, paripuram va silakkhandham tattha tattha pannaya anugganheyyan”ti yo tattha chando ca vayamo ca ussaho ca ussolhi ca appativani ca sati ca sampajannanca atappam padhanam adhitthanam anuyogo appamatto appamado kusalesu dhammesu.
cnd8:80.12: vimuttinanadassanakkhandham paripureyyam paripuram va vimuttinanadassanakkhandham tattha tattha pannaya anugganheyyan”ti yo tattha chando ca vayamo ca ussaho ca ussolhi ca appativani ca sati ca sampajannanca atappam padhanam adhitthanam anuyogo appamatto appamado kusalesu dhammesu.
cnd8:80.13: “Kathaham aparinnatam va dukkham parijaneyyam, appahine va kilese pajaheyyam, abhavitam va maggam bhaveyyam, asacchikatam va nirodham sacchikareyyan”ti yo tattha chando ca vayamo ca ussaho ca ussolhi ca appativani ca sati ca sampajannanca atappam padhanam adhitthanam anuyogo appamatto appamado kusalesu dhammesuti—
cnd8:81.2: Bhikkhuti puthujjanakalyanako va bhikkhu sekkho va bhikkhu.
cnd8:81.3: Caranti caranto viharanto iriyanto vattento palento yapento yapento.
cnd8:81.8: tanhamamattam pahaya ditthimamattam patinissajjitva mamatte jahitva cajitva pajahitva vinodetva byantikaritva anabhavam gametvati—
cnd8:82.1: Jatim jaram sokapariddavanca, idheva vidva pajaheyya dukkhanti.
cnd8:82.11: Jatim jaram sokapariddavanca, idheva vidva pajaheyya dukkhanti vijjagato nani vibhavi medhavi idheva jatinca jaranca sokapariddavanca dukkhanca pajaheyya vinodeyya byantikareyya anabhavam gameyyati—
cnd8:82.12: jatim jaram sokapariddavanca, idheva vidva pajaheyya dukkham.
cnd8:85.2: Etanti tuyham vacanam byappatham desanam anusasanam anusittham nandami abhinandami modami anumodami icchami sadiyami patthayami pihayami abhijappami.
cnd8:85.4: Mahantam silakkhandham esi gavesi pariyesiti mahesi …pe…
cnd8:86.2: Sukittitanti sukittitam suacikkhitam sudesitam supannapitam supatthapitam suvivaritam suvibhajitam suuttanikatam supakasitanti—
cnd8:86.4: Gotamanupadhikanti upadhi vuccanti kilesa ca khandha ca abhisankhara ca.
cnd8:86.5: Upadhippahanam upadhivupasamam upadhipatinissaggam upadhipatipassaddham amatam nibbananti—
cnd8:87.2: Addhati ekamsavacanam nissamsayavacanam nikkankhavacanam advejjhavacanam advelhakavacanam nirodhavacanam apannakavacanam avatthapanavacanametam—
cnd8:87.5: Pahasi dukkhanti jatidukkham jaradukkham byadhidukkham maranadukkham sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasadukkham pahasi pajahi vinodesi byantikarosi anabhavam gamesiti—
cnd8:88.1: Tatha hi te vidito esa dhammoti tatha hi te vidito tulito tirito vibhuto vibhavito esa dhammoti—
cnd8:88.2: tatha hi te vidito esa dhammo.
cnd8:89.4: Tatha hi te vidito esa dhammo”ti.
cnd8:91.2: Te capiti khattiya ca brahmana ca vessa ca sudda ca gahattha ca pabbajita ca deva ca manussa ca.
cnd8:91.3: Pajaheyyu dukkhanti jatidukkham jaradukkham byadhidukkham maranadukkham sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasadukkham pajaheyyum vinodeyyum byantikareyyum anabhavam gameyyunti—
cnd8:92.2: Yeti khattiye ca brahmane ca vesse ca sudde ca gahatthe ca pabbajite ca deve ca manusse ca.
cnd8:92.4: Muniti monam vuccati nanam …pe… sangajalamaticca so muni.
cnd8:92.5: Atthitam ovadeyyati atthitam ovadeyya sakkaccam ovadeyya abhinham ovadeyya punappunam ovadeyya anusaseyyati—
cnd8:93.3: Namassamiti kayena va namassami, vacaya va namassami, cittena va namassami, anvatthapatipattiya va namassami, dhammanudhammapatipattiya va namassami, sakkaromi garum karomi manemi pujemi.
cnd8:93.4: Sameccati samecca abhisamecca samagantva abhisamagantva sammukha tam namassami.
cnd8:93.5: Nagati nago ca bhagava agum na karotiti—
cnd8:93.11: Agu vuccati papaka akusala dhamma sankilesika ponobhavika sadara dukkhavipaka ayatim jatijaramaraniya.
cnd8:96.3: Bhagava na chandagatim gacchati, na dosagatim gacchati, na mohagatim gacchati, na bhayagatim gacchati, na ragavasena gacchati, na dosavasena gacchati, na mohavasena gacchati, na manavasena gacchati, na ditthivasena gacchati, na uddhaccavasena gacchati, na vicikicchavasena gacchati, na anusayavasena gacchati, na vaggehi dhammehi yayati niyati vuyhati samhariyati.
cnd8:97.3: Sotapattimaggena ye kilesa pahina te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccagacchati.
cnd8:97.6: arahattamaggena ye kilesa pahina te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccagacchati.
cnd8:98.1: Appeva mam bhagava atthitam ovadeyyati appeva mam bhagava atthitam ovadeyya sakkaccam ovadeyya abhinham ovadeyya punappunam ovadeyya anusaseyyati—
cnd8:101.3: Sakkayaditthi bahita hoti, vicikiccha bahita hoti, silabbataparamaso bahito hoti, rago bahito hoti, doso bahito hoti, moho bahito hoti, mano bahito hoti.
cnd8:101.4: Bahitassa honti papaka akusala dhamma sankilesika ponobhavika sadara dukkhavipaka ayatim jatijaramaraniya.
cnd8:104.2: Akincananti ragakincanam dosakincanam mohakincanam manakincanam ditthikincanam kilesakincanam duccaritakincanam, yassete kincana pahina samucchinna vupasanta patipassaddha abhabbuppattika nanaggina daddha, so vuccati akincano.
cnd8:104.10: Akincanam kamabhave asattanti akincanam puggalam kamabhave ca asattam alaggam alaggitam apalibuddham nikkhantam nissatam vippamuttam visannuttam vimariyadikatena cetasa viharantanti—
cnd8:106.2: Tinnoti kamogham tinno, bhavogham tinno, ditthogham tinno, avijjogham tinno, samsarapatham tinno uttinno nitthinno atikkanto samatikkanto vitivatto.
cnd8:106.3: So vutthavaso cinnacarano gataddho gatadiso gatakotiko palitabrahmacariyo uttamaditthippatto bhavitamaggo, pahinakileso patividdhakuppo sacchikatanirodho.
cnd8:106.4: Dukkham tassa parinnatam, samudayo pahino, maggo bhavito, nirodho sacchikato, abhinneyyam abhinnatam, parinneyyam parinnatam, pahatabbam pahinam, bhavetabbam bhavitam, sacchikatabbam sacchikatam.
cnd8:106.5: So ukkhittapaligho sankinnaparikkho abbulhesiko niraggalo ariyo pannaddhajo pannabharo visannutto pancangavippahino chalangasamannagato ekarakkho caturapasseno panunnapaccekasacco samavayasatthesano anavilasankappo passaddhakayasankharo suvimuttacitto suvimuttapanno kevali vusitava uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattippatto.
cnd8:106.6: So neva acinati na apacinati, apacinitva thito.
cnd8:106.7: Neva pajahati na upadiyati, pajahitva thito.
cnd8:106.8: Neva visineti na ussineti, visinetva thito.
cnd8:106.9: Neva vidhupeti na sandhupeti, vidhupetva thito.
cnd8:108.1: Tinno ca paranti param vuccati amatam nibbanam.
cnd8:108.2: Yo so sabbasankharasamatho sabbupadhipatinissaggo tanhakkhayo virago nirodho nibbanam.
cnd8:108.3: So paragato parappatto antagato antappatto kotigato kotippatto pariyantagato pariyantappatto vosanagato vosanappatto tanagato tanappatto lenagato lenappatto saranagato saranappatto abhayagato abhayappatto accutagato accutappatto amatagato amatappatto nibbanagato nibbanappatto.
cnd8:108.4: So vutthavaso cinnacarano …pe… jatimaranasamsaro, natthi tassa punabbhavoti—
cnd8:109.1: Akhiloti rago khilo, doso khilo, moho khilo, kodho khilo, upanaho khilo …pe…
cnd8:109.3: Yassete khila pahina samucchinna vupasanta patipassaddha abhabbuppattika nanaggina daddha so vuccati akhilo.
cnd8:109.4: Akankhoti dukkhe kankha, dukkhasamudaye kankha, dukkhanirodhe kankha, dukkhanirodhagaminiya patipadaya kankha, pubbante kankha, aparante kankha, pubbantaparante kankha, idappaccayatapaticcasamuppannesu dhammesu kankha, ya evarupa kankha kankhayana kankhayitattam vimati vicikiccha dvelhakam dvedhapatho samsayo anekamsaggaho asappana parisappana apariyogahana chambhitattam cittassa manovilekho.
cnd8:109.5: Yassete kankha pahina samucchinna vupasanta patipassaddha abhabbuppattika nanaggina daddha so vuccati akankhoti—
cnd8:112.5: Vedaguti vedo vuccati catusu maggesu nanam panna pannindriyam pannabalam dhammavicayasambojjhango vimamsa vipassana sammaditthi.
cnd8:112.6: Tehi vedehi jatijaramaranassa antagato antappatto kotigato kotippatto pariyantagato pariyantappatto vosanagato vosanappatto tanagato tanappatto lenagato lenappatto saranagato saranappatto abhayagato abhayappatto accutagato accutappatto amatagato amatappatto nibbanagato nibbanappatto.
cnd8:112.7: Vedanam va antagatoti vedagu, vedehi va antagatoti vedagu, sattannam va dhammanam viditatta vedagu.
cnd8:112.14: Viditassa honti papaka akusala dhamma sankilesika ponobhavika sadara dukkhavipaka ayatim jatijaramaraniya.
cnd8:114.1: Naroti satto naro manavo poso puggalo jivo jagu jantu indagu manujo.
cnd8:114.4: vidva ca yo vedagu naro idha.
cnd8:115.2: Bhavabhaveti bhavabhave kammabhave punabbhave kamabhave, kammabhave kamabhave punabbhave rupabhave, kammabhave rupabhave punabbhave arupabhave, kammabhave arupabhave punabbhave punappunabbhave, punappunagatiya punappunaupapattiya punappunapatisandhiya punappunaattabhavabhinibbattiya.
cnd8:115.4: ragasango, dosasango, mohasango, manasango, ditthisango, kilesasango, duccaritasango.
cnd8:115.6: Atha va sange bandhe vibandhe abandhe lagge laggite palibuddhe bandhane photayitva va visajja.
cnd8:115.7: Yatha yanam va vayham va ratham va sakatam va sandamanikam va sajjam visajjam karonti vikopenti—
cnd8:115.8: evameva te sange vosajjetva va visajja.
cnd8:115.9: Atha va sange bandhe vibandhe abandhe lagge laggite palibuddhe bandhane photayitva va visajjati—
cnd8:116.1: So vitatanho anigho niraso, atari so jatijaranti brumiti.
cnd8:116.2: Tanhati rupatanha …pe… dhammatanha … yassesa tanha pahina samucchinna vupasanta patipassaddha abhabbuppattika nanaggina daddha, so vuccati vitatanho vigatatanho cattatanho vantatanho muttatanho pahinatanho patinissatthatanho vitarago cattarago pahinarago patinissattharago nicchato nibbuto sitibhuto sukhappatisamvedi brahmabhutena attana viharatiti—
cnd8:116.4: Anighoti rago nigho, doso nigho, moho nigho, kodho nigho, upanaho nigho …pe… sabbakusalabhisankhara nigha.
cnd8:116.5: Yassete nigha pahina samucchinna vupasanta patipassaddha abhabbuppattika nanaggina daddha, so vuccati anigho.
cnd8:116.7: Yo rago sarago …pe… abhijjha lobho akusalamulam.
cnd8:116.8: Yassesa asa tanha pahina samucchinna vupasanta patipassaddha abhabbuppattika nanaggina daddha, so vuccati niraso.
cnd8:116.9: Jatiti ya tesam tesam sattanam …pe… ayatananam patilabho.
cnd8:116.10: Jarati ya tesam tesam sattanam …pe… indriyanam paripako.
cnd8:116.12: So vitatanho anigho niraso, atari so jatijaranti brumiti yo so vitatanho anigho ca niraso ca, so kho jatijaramaranam atari uttari patari samatikkami vitivattayiti brumi acikkhami desemi pannapemi patthapemi vivarami vibhajami uttanikaromi pakasemiti—
cnd8:116.13: so vitatanho anigho niraso, atari so jatijaranti brumi.
